name: The Cold Hand
description: The Cold Hand is a simple 2D platformer featuring collectibles, enemies, multiple levels, and multiple endings which are achieved based on the combination of your actions within each level, all deriving from the overarching story of your character's struggle with mental health. With 10 endings to experience in total, some good, some bad, some in the middle, and one, true ending, The Cold Hand is sure to capture your attention for some time.
